extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension (less than 250 characters).
extensionDescription.message: Communicate with your XMPP network directly from your browser sidebar.

sidebarTitle.description: Title shown in the sidebar panel.

authenticate.description: Label used to describe authentication part of options

xmpp-identifier-label.description: Label used to ask a XMPP Identifier.

xmpp-identifier-placeholder.description: Placeholder used to show an example of XMPP Identifier

password-label.description: Label used to ask a password.

password-placeholder.description: Placeholder used to explain the password field should be filled only to set or update it.
password-placeholder.message: Fill password only to set or update it.

websocket-label.description: Label used to ask the WebSocket URL.

websocket-placeholder.description: Placeholder showing an example of WebSocket URL.

websocket-help.description: Explain when the Websocket URL is optional
websocket-help.message: Optional when it is discoverable from a well-known URL on the XMPP domain.

save-start.description: Label for button Save and Start
